changelog.title: Dark Arts Vault Expansion
changelog.description: Massive content update: Gate 6 & 7, 5 new modules, Analysis Toolkit, and Dark Arts Quiz.

changelog.title: Gates 6 & 7 Complete
changelog.description: Static Analysis CTF (Gate 6) and Threat Attribution Challenge (Gate 7) now fully playable.

changelog.title: 5 New Dark Arts Modules
changelog.description: Behavioral Analysis, Dynamic Analysis, Reverse Engineering, Incident Response, and more.

changelog.title: Analysis Toolkit
changelog.description: 7 interactive tools: Hex decoder, Base64, XOR brute force, entropy calculator, IOC extractor.
